name: Dusk '82
description:
Dusk '82 is a retro-styled puzzle/adventure game based on the 2018 hit shooter DUSK. Solve X bite-sized levels inspired by puzzle classics like Chip's Challenge and Sokoban, or make and share your own levels with an intuitive map editor and full workshop support. Levels can even be copied and shared as a simple text string!

Enemies and their projectiles only move when you move and levels are filled with a variety of hazards. Use smart planning to outmaneuver and eliminate cultists with classic weapons like the shotgun, riveter, crossbow, and the all powerful soap. Use movable barrels and other explosives to blast through walls. Zip around on conveyor belts to quickly reposition. Dodge bullets with the inhuman skill and agility only possible through turn-based movement. Then, find your way to the exit.

FEATURES:

  • The cult hit shooter DUSK re-imagined as a movement centered action puzzle game
  • Simple to use editor for making your own levels and map packs
  • Tile set can be easily modified for maximum memes
  • Scoring system that is easy to learn and hard to master
  • Minimalist retro artstyle based on classic DOS and Atari aesthetics
  • Drop your own music (or podcasts or memes) into a folder to listen to them in game
  • Achievements and Steam trading cards
  • Workshop Support
  • Two free retro ASCII games included
